class.name: TextureLayeredRD
class.brief_description: Abstract base class for layered texture RD types.
class.description: Base class for [Texture2DArrayRD], [TextureCubemapRD] and [TextureCubemapArrayRD]. Cannot be used directly, but contains all the functions necessary for accessing the derived resource types.

members.member: The RID of the texture object created on the [RenderingDevice].
